Manufacturer claims of the balance point are often incorrect due to quality control and change after ordinary maintenance such as new grips, strings, etc.

To determine the balance point: lie a racquet on a table or counter top with the handle portion hanging off the edge. Slowly slide the racquet until it reaches a balancing point where it is about to fall off. Mark this point and measure from the bottom of the handle.
Use the ruler guide to determine the decimals used for each hash mark on the ruler.
